reviews.review_text: One of the best restaurant and cafe in goa. King fish tali is very nice. Neat and tidy restaurant. Easy access. Everyone is very helpful.

"The food is good, and the Goan-style thalis are authentic. However, the hygiene standards need serious improvement. I was shocked to see staff sleeping with their bare stomachs exposed in the dining area. I had taken international guests with me, and unfortunately, they ended up with a stomach infection after dining here. I hope the management takes this feedback seriously and improves cleanliness to match the quality of their food."
Food was okay. If you want to feel the real goan old vibe . Visit there.
